original_text: You sold the people from Judah and Jerusalem to the Greek people. You wanted to send them a long way from their own country.
korean_text: 또 유다 자손과 예루살렘 자손들을 헬라 족속에게 팔아서 그들의 영토에서 멀리 떠나게 하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: You sold the people from Judah and Jerusalem
You wanted to send them a long way
